description.text: this message file contains message for [name] package

msg.text: Property 'INIT_DATA' for EBR comp '$$s' is set to '$$s' but only 'STATIC' is allowed for this device.
Property 'EFB_UFM' for EFB comp '$$s' is set to '$$s' but only 'DISABLED' is allowed for this device.

SED device density parameter '$$s' does not match that of the selected device. Software has changed the DEV_DENSITY value to '$$s' to match the device that is used in this project. Post Place and Route (PAR) simulation may not match with your earlier simulations.
Property 'INIT_DATA' for EBR comp '$$s' is set to '$$s' but only 'STATIC', 'DYNAMIC', or 'NO_INIT' is allowed for this device.
In the SYSCONFIG, when PRIMARY_BOOT or SECONDARY_BOOT is set to 'EXTERNAL', MASTER_SPI_PORT can only be set to 'ENABLE' for this device.
